statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_reports ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_reports WHERE lead_time_days > 5;
SELECT supplier_name FROM supplier_reports WHERE delivery_performance >= 0.9 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_reports WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time_days FROM supplier_reports WHERE delivery_performance < 0.8 ORDER BY lead_time_days DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_reports WHERE supplier_id = 101 ORDER BY lead_time_days DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM supplier_reports WHERE supplier_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_suppliers FROM supplier_reports WHERE lead_time_days > 5
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_reports WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY supplier_id
SELECT MAX(lead_time_days) AS max_lead_time FROM supplier_reports
SELECT * FROM SupplierLeadTimes;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM SupplierLeadTimes ORDER BY lead_time DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, report_date FROM SupplierLeadTimes WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SupplierLeadTimes;
SELECT delivery_id, supplier_id, delivery_date FROM DeliveryPerformance WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM SupplierLeadTimes WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time, report_date FROM SupplierLeadTimes WHERE lead_time > 5;
SELECT delivery_id, supplier_id, delivery_date FROM DeliveryPerformance WHERE delivery_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(lead_time) AS total_lead_time FROM SupplierLeadTimes GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_lead_time > 20;
SELECT * FROM SupplierLeadTimes JOIN DeliveryPerformance ON SupplierLeadTimes.supplier_id = DeliveryPerformance.supplier_id WHERE SupplierLeadTimes.lead_time < 10;
SELECT * FROM vendor_management_reports;
SELECT report_id, supplier_id, report_date FROM vendor_management_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, supplier_id, delivery_id, report_type FROM vendor_management_reports WHERE supplier_id = 5;
SELECT report_id, report_type FROM vendor_management_reports WHERE report_type LIKE '%performance%';
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(lead_time) AS avg_lead_time FROM supplier_lead_times GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE lead_time > 5;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_time, delivery_status FROM delivery_performance ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type FROM vendor_management_reports WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY lead_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_report WHERE id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time FROM supplier_report ORDER BY lead_time DESC
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_report ORDER BY delivery_performance ASC
SELECT * FROM lead_time_report WHERE lead_time > 5
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location, contact_email FROM vendor_management
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_report WHERE lead_time > 5
SELECT * FROM lead_time_report WHERE lead_time < 10 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time, delivery_date FROM supplier_report JOIN lead_time_report ON supplier_report.id = lead_time_report.supplier_id WHERE lead_time > 3

SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date FROM supplier_report JOIN delivery_performance_report ON supplier_report.id = delivery_performance_report.supplier_id WHERE delivery_performance > 0.8 ORDER BY delivery_date
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location, contact_email FROM vendor_management
SELECT * FROM supplier_reports;
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time FROM supplier_reports ORDER BY lead_time DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_reports WHERE delivery_performance > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM delivery_reports WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_management ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_reports WHERE lead_time > 5 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_reports JOIN performance_metrics ON supplier_reports.supplier_id = performance_metrics.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time, delivery_performance FROM supplier_reports WHERE delivery_performance < 0.8 ORDER BY lead_time ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time, delivery_performance FROM supplier_reports WHERE lead_time > (SELECT AVG(lead_time_days) FROM lead_time_metrics);

SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date, delivery_time FROM supplier_reports JOIN delivery_reports ON supplier_reports.supplier_id = delivery_reports.supplier_id ORDER BY delivery_date DESC, delivery_time ASC;
